channel.title: Pages on Hooked on Data
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Hooked on Data

item.title: About
item.description: I work at DataCamp as a Data Scientist on the growth team. Previously, I was a Data Analyst at Etsy working with their search team to design, implement, and analyze experiments on the ranking algorithm, UI changes, and new features. In summer 2016, I completed Metis’s three-month, full-time Data Science Bootcamp, where I did several data science projects, ranging from using random forests to predict successful projects on DonorsChoose.org to building an application in R Shiny that helps data science freelancers find their best-fit jobs.

item.title: Speaking
item.description: I regularly give talks on A/B Testing, working in R, joining the Data Science community, and more. If you’re interested in having me speak at your event, please contact me at emily[at]datacamp.com Upcoming Talks March 2019, CXL Live. Previous Talks Building an A/B Testing Analytics System November 2018, DC R Conference. October 2018, Nor’eastR Conference. 10 Guidelines for A/B Testing October 2018, PyData NYC. Joining the Data Science Community May & July 2018, Metis Data Science Bootcamp.
